events.message: We have successfully received the candidate's application for the software engineer position and look forward to reviewing it thoroughly.
The application was categorized under Engineering due to the candidate's background in software development and engineering skills.
A recruiter specialized in Engineering roles has been assigned to manage this candidate's recruitment process to ensure the best fit.
The initial screening call was completed, and the candidate demonstrated a strong understanding of software engineering principles.
The candidate responded promptly and enthusiastically accepted the invitation to proceed to the technical interview stage.
A technical interview appointment has been scheduled for the candidate to assess coding skills and problem-solving abilities.
